resources.string: This is the main screen of the app, user can click on whether he wants to return to the activity playing the current song, display a list of all songs/albums or choose to search for songs/albums
This activity displays the song being currently played by the user. From this activity the user would be able to switch to the next/previous song
This activity displays a list of songs, the user will see a bttton to play each song
This activity would let the user select an album and play all the songs in it
In this activity user could search for songs/albums and play those based on the search results
